mapper.sql: LDM_ATTR_ID, LDM_ATTR_PNM, LDM_ATTR_LNM, LDM_ENTY_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

LDM_ATTR_PNM, LDM_ATTR_LNM, LDM_ENTY_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ENTY_ID , A.SDITM_ID , C.SDITM_LNM , C.SDITM_PNM , D.DMN_ID , D.DMN_LNM , D.DMN_PNM , E.INFOTP_ID , E.INFOTP_LNM , A.ATTR_ORD , CASE WHEN A.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN A.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||','|| A.DATA_SCAL ||')' ELSE A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||')' END ) END AS DATA_TYPE , NVL(A.PK_YN, 'N') AS PK_YN , A.PK_ORD , NVL(A.NONUL_YN, 'N') AS NONUL_YN , A.DEFLT_VAL , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , B.SUBJ_ID , SUBJ.SUBJ_LNM , SUBJ.FULL_PATH , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_LDM_ENTY B INNER JOIN WAM_LDM_ATTR A ON A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.SDITM_ID = A.SDITM_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN D ON D.DMN_ID = C.DMN_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ SUBJ ON SUBJ.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231', 'YYYYMMDD') AND SUBJ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SUBJ.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID
AND B.LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.LDM_ENTY_LNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND (A.LDM_ATTR_LNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR A.LDM_ATTR_PNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND B.SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SUBJ.FULL_PATH LIKE #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%'
ORDER BY B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , A.ATTR_ORD

SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.DATA_TYPE||'('||A.DATA_LEN||')'||A.DATA_SCAL , A.OBJ_DESCN FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR A , WAH_PDM_TBL B WHERE A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID AND A.LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.OBJ_VERS <= B.OBJ_VERS AND A.STR_DTM <= (B.STR_DTM + INTERVAL '1' SECOND) AND A.EXP_DTM > B.EXP_DTM AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY A.STR_DTM

SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ENTY_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , A.SDITM_ID , C.SDITM_LNM , C.SDITM_PNM , D.DMN_ID , D.DMN_LNM , D.DMN_PNM , E.INFOTP_ID , E.INFOTP_LNM , A.ATTR_ORD , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.PK_YN , A.PK_ORD , A.NONUL_YN , A.DEFLT_VAL , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , A.EXP_DTM , A.STR_DTM , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR A LEFT JOIN WAM_LDM_ENTY B ON B.LDM_ENTY_ID = A.LDM_ENTY_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON C.SDITM_ID = A.SDITM_ID LEFT JOIN WAM_DMN D ON D.DMN_ID = C.DMN_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE E ON E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND E.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID WHERE A.LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC , A.ATTR_ORD , A.OBJ_VERS DESC
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_LDM_ATTR (LDM_ATTR_ID, LDM_ATTR_PNM, LDM_ATTR_LNM, LDM_ENTY_ID, SDITM_ID, COL_ORD, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, PK_YN, PK_ORD, NONUL_YN, DEFLT_VAL, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{ldmAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldmAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WAM_LDM_ATTR
LDM_ATTR_ID,
LDM_ATTR_PNM,
LDM_ATTR_LNM,
LDM_ENTY_ID,
SDITM_ID,
COL_ORD,
DATA_TYPE,
DATA_LEN,
DATA_SCAL,
PK_YN,
PK_ORD,
NONUL_YN,
DEFLT_VAL,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
RQST_DTL_SNO,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{ldmAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ldmAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAM_LDM_ATTR
LDM_ATTR_PNM = #{ldmAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LDM_ATTR_LNM = #{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LDM_ATTR_ID = #{ldmAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_LDM_ATTR set LDM_ATTR_PNM = #{ldmAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LDM_ATTR_LNM = #{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PK_YN = #{pkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_ORD = #{pkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NONUL_YN = #{nonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LDM_ATTR_ID = #{ldmAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , B.LDM_ENTY_PNM , C.SUBJ_ID , C.FULL_PATH AS SUBJ_LNM , C.SUBJ_PNM FROM WAM_LDM_ATTR A INNER JOIN WAM_LDM_ENTY B ON A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON B.SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND (B.LDM_ENTY_LNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR B.LDM_ENTY_LNM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{ldmEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' OR B.LDM_ENTY_PNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR B.LDM_ENTY_PNM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{ldmEntyLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%')
AND (A.LDM_ATTR_LNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR A.LDM_ATTR_LNM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' OR A.LDM_ATTR_PNM LIKE '%'||#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR A.LDM_ATTR_PNM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{ldmAttrLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%')
AND C.SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY C.FULL_PATH, B.LDM_ENTY_LNM, A.COL_ORD

--컬럼이력조회 SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ENTY_ID , A.SDITM_ID , C.SDITM_LNM , C.SDITM_PNM , D.DMN_ID , D.DMN_LNM , D.DMN_PNM , E.INFOTP_ID , E.INFOTP_LNM , A.COL_ORD , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.PK_YN , A.PK_ORD , A.NONUL_YN , A.DEFLT_VAL , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , A.EXP_DTM , A.STR_DTM , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_LDM_ENTY B ON A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_SDITM C ON A.SDITM_ID = C.SDITM_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN D ON C.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE E ON D.INFOTP_ID = E.INFOTP_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE 1=1 AND A.LDM_ATTR_ID = #{ldmAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.LDM_ATTR_PNM, A.OBJ_VERS DESC, A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC

--버전별 컬럼리스트 조회 SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , DECODE(A.RQST_NO,B.RQST_NO, A.REG_TYP_CD,DECODE(#{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'1',A.REG_TYP_CD,NULL)) AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM , B.LDM_ENTY_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , B.LDM_ENTY_PNM , C.SUBJ_ID , C.FULL_PATH AS SUBJ_LNM , C.SUBJ_PNM , A.COL_ORD , B.FULL_PATH , CASE WHEN A.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN A.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||','|| A.DATA_SCAL ||')' ELSE A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||')' END ) END AS DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.PK_YN , A.PK_ORD , A.NONUL_YN , A.DEFLT_VAL , NVL(A.ENC_YN,'N') ENC_YN FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR A INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL B ON A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON B.SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.LDM_ENTY_ID =#{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.OBJ_VERS <= #{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.OBJ_VERS = (SELECT MAX(OBJ_VERS) FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR C WHERE A.LDM_ATTR_ID = C.LDM_ATTR_ID AND OBJ_VERS <= #{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(B.RQST_NO,5)) >= TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(C.RQST_NO,5)) ) AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(A.RQST_NO,5)) <= TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(B.RQST_NO,5)) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
UNION ALL SELECT A.LDM_ATTR_ID , A.LDM_ATTR_LNM , A.LDM_ATTR_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , DECODE(A.RQST_NO,B.RQST_NO, A.REG_TYP_CD,DECODE(#{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'1',A.REG_TYP_CD,NULL)) AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM , B.LDM_ENTY_ID , B.LDM_ENTY_LNM , B.LDM_ENTY_PNM , C.SUBJ_ID , C.FULL_PATH AS SUBJ_LNM , C.SUBJ_PNM , A.COL_ORD , B.FULL_PATH ,CASE WHEN A.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN A.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||','|| A.DATA_SCAL ||')' ELSE A.DATA_TYPE || '(' || A.DATA_LEN ||')' END ) END AS DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.PK_YN , A.PK_ORD , A.NONUL_YN , A.DEFLT_VAL , NVL(A.ENC_YN,'N') ENC_YN FROM WAH_LDM_ATTR A INNER JOIN WAH_PDM_TBL B ON A.LDM_ENTY_ID = B.LDM_ENTY_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON B.SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.LDM_ENTY_ID = #{ldmEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('D')
) ORDER BY FULL_PATH, LDM_ENTY_LNM, COL_ORD
